constraints: Use instruction.spec artifacts as the execution contract; SKILL.md remains human-facing.
If required instruction artifacts are missing from the ContextPack, emit UNPLANNED_CONTEXT_READ.
Deterministic gates run before LLM-assisted gates.
Always emit a review evidence bundle, even when all gates pass.

instructions.text: Load rfc-council instruction.spec artifacts (workflow, review_mode, review_rubric, council_protocol, create/explore/closure, finding_categories, commands) and follow them verbatim.
Enforce gate order and prerequisites exactly as specified in instruction.spec sources.
When ambiguity remains, prefer evidence-backed codebase anchors before changing requirements.

payload.intent: Execute RFC Council creation/review with deterministic gates, evidence, and council deliberation.
